10#ifndef MODULES_CONGESTION_CONTROLLER_GOOG_CC_TRENDLINE_ESTIMATOR_H_
11#define MODULES_CONGESTION_CONTROLLER_GOOG_CC_TRENDLINE_ESTIMATOR_H_
12
13#include <stddef.h>
14#include <stdint.h>
15
16#include <deque>
17#include <memory>
18#include <utility>
19
20#include "api/network_state_predictor.h"
21#include "api/transport/webrtc_key_value_config.h"
22#include "modules/congestion_controller/goog_cc/delay_increase_detector_interface.h"
23#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
24#include "rtc_base/experiments/struct_parameters_parser.h"
25
26namespace webrtc {
27
28struct TrendlineEstimatorSettings {
29 static constexpr char kKey[] = "WebRTC-Bwe-TrendlineEstimatorSettings";
30 static constexpr unsigned kDefaultTrendlineWindowSize = 20;
31
32 TrendlineEstimatorSettings() = delete;
33 explicit TrendlineEstimatorSettings(
34 const WebRtcKeyValueConfig* key_value_config);
35
36 // Sort the packets in the window. Should be redundant,
37 // but then almost no cost.
38 bool enable_sort = false;
39
40 // Cap the trendline slope based on the minimum delay seen
41 // in the beginning_packets and end_packets respectively.
42 bool enable_cap = false;
43 unsigned beginning_packets = 7;
44 unsigned end_packets = 7;
45 double cap_uncertainty = 0.0;
46
47 // Size (in packets) of the window.
48 unsigned window_size = kDefaultTrendlineWindowSize;
49
50 std::unique_ptr<StructParametersParser> Parser();
51};
52
53class TrendlineEstimator : public DelayIncreaseDetectorInterface {
54 public:
55 TrendlineEstimator(const WebRtcKeyValueConfig* key_value_config,
56 NetworkStatePredictor* network_state_predictor);
57
58 ~TrendlineEstimator() override;
59
60 // Update the estimator with a new sample. The deltas should represent deltas
61 // between timestamp groups as defined by the InterArrival class.
62 void Update(double recv_delta_ms,
63 double send_delta_ms,
64 int64_t send_time_ms,
65 int64_t arrival_time_ms,
66 size_t packet_size,
67 bool calculated_deltas) override;
68
69 void UpdateTrendline(double recv_delta_ms,
70 double send_delta_ms,
71 int64_t send_time_ms,
72 int64_t arrival_time_ms,
73 size_t packet_size);
74
75 BandwidthUsage State() const override;
76
77 struct PacketTiming {
78 PacketTiming(double arrival_time_ms,
79 double smoothed_delay_ms,
80 double raw_delay_ms)
81 : arrival_time_ms(arrival_time_ms),
82 smoothed_delay_ms(smoothed_delay_ms),
83 raw_delay_ms(raw_delay_ms) {}
84 double arrival_time_ms;
85 double smoothed_delay_ms;
86 double raw_delay_ms;
87 };
88
89 private:
90 friend class GoogCcStatePrinter;
91 void Detect(double trend, double ts_delta, int64_t now_ms);
92
93 void UpdateThreshold(double modified_offset, int64_t now_ms);
94
95 // Parameters.
96 TrendlineEstimatorSettings settings_;
97 const double smoothing_coef_;
98 const double threshold_gain_;
99 // Used by the existing threshold.
100 int num_of_deltas_;
101 // Keep the arrival times small by using the change from the first packet.
102 int64_t first_arrival_time_ms_;
103 // Exponential backoff filtering.
104 double accumulated_delay_;
105 double smoothed_delay_;
106 // Linear least squares regression.
107 std::deque<PacketTiming> delay_hist_;
108
109 const double k_up_;
110 const double k_down_;
111 double overusing_time_threshold_;
112 double threshold_;
113 double prev_modified_trend_;
114 int64_t last_update_ms_;
115 double prev_trend_;
116 double time_over_using_;
117 int overuse_counter_;
118 BandwidthUsage hypothesis_;
119 BandwidthUsage hypothesis_predicted_;
120 NetworkStatePredictor* network_state_predictor_;
121
122 RTC_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(TrendlineEstimator);
123};
124} // namespace webrtc
125
126#endif // MODULES_CONGESTION_CONTROLLER_GOOG_CC_TRENDLINE_ESTIMATOR_H_
127
